channel.title: James River Church Video Podcast
channel.description:
Welcome to the James River Church video podcast where you will find weekly encouraging sermons from Pastor John Lindell and others! James River Church is one church in multiple locations in the Southwest Missouri area. To learn more, visit jamesriver.church.
James River Church, led by Pastors John and Debbie Lindell, is one church in four locations in southwest Missouri, with additional campuses online. The church is passionate about making everyone connected to James River Church feel welcomed home through inspiring worship services and high-energy kids and youth programs. The leadership at James River Church is dedicated to teaching the whole Word of God through engaging, expository preaching. We pray these messages are a blessing and encouragement to your life as God reveals His truth to you through the good news of the Gospel!
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the James River Church podcast where you will find weekly encouraging sermons from Pastor John Lindell and others! James River Church is one church in multiple locations in the Southwest Missouri area. To learn more, visit jamesriver.church.

item.title: Discouraged, Not Defeated | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Discouraged, Not Defeated | David Lindell
item.description:
How do you overcome discouragement and find hope in God?
In this message from Pastor David Lindell, Psalm 42 shows us how to respond to discouragement with faith—anchoring our hearts in God’s unfailing love and choosing hope. Our prayer is that you would preach truth to your soul, stay connected to God’s people, and remember that in Christ, you are not defeated.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: The Sin Of Prejudice And Partiality | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Sin Of Prejudice And Partiality | John Lindell
item.description:
What does the Bible say about prejudice?

In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we confront the sin of prejudice in James 2:1–13 and see that God shows no partiality. Our prayer is that you would live out the mercy and impartial love of Jesus, treating every person with the grace and dignity Christ has shown you.
item.content:encoded:
What does the Bible say about prejudice?

item.title: How Can I Hear God’s Voice Clearly? | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: How Can I Hear God’s Voice Clearly? | John Lindell
item.description:
How Can I Hear God’s Voice Clearly?

In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we discover clear, biblical steps to hearing God’s voice—through repentance, closeness to His presence, obedience, and a life grounded in His Word. Our prayer is that as you lean in and listen, you will recognize His voice with confidence and respond with faith.

item.title: Truths About True Religion | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Truths About True Religion | John Lindell
item.description:
What is true religion?

In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we discover from James 1 that true religion is revealed in how we speak, how we care for those in need, and how we guard our lives from the world’s influence. Our prayer is that you would not merely listen to God’s Word, but live it out daily with integrity, love, and wholehearted devotion to Christ.

item.title: Are You Listening? | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Are You Listening? | John Lindell
item.description:
How Can I Hear God’s Voice When He Feels Silent?

In this message from Pastor John Lindell, based on 1 Samuel 3:1–10, we are reminded that God is always speaking—but He speaks most clearly to those who are positioned in His presence and willing to say, “Speak, Lord, for Your servant is listening.” Our prayer is that you would move beyond complacency, draw near to God with fresh hunger, and develop a heart that is ready to hear and obey His voice.

item.title: Kingdom Impact Sunday | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: Kingdom Impact Sunday | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
How can my giving make an eternal impact around the world?
In this message from Pastor Brandon Lindell, we are challenged to see Kingdom Impact giving as a faith-filled response to Jesus’ call to reach our Jerusalem, our nation, and the nations of the world with the gospel. Our prayer is that as you listen, God would speak clearly to your heart, stir bold faith within you, and use your generosity to change lives for eternity.

item.title: Hunger for God | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Hunger for God | John Lindell
item.description:
Do you hunger for God?
In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we learn how spiritual hunger impacts our ability to receive from God, changes our desires, and is intensified through intentional pursuit of His presence. Our prayer is that this message would stir a fresh hunger in your heart to seek God wholeheartedly and experience deeper transformation in your walk with Him.

item.title: Making a Kingdom Impact | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Making a Kingdom Impact | David Lindell
item.description:
Am I building what Jesus is building with my life and my resources?

In this message from Pastor David Lindell, we are confronted with a defining question about whether our priorities align with God’s heart to reach the lost through His Church—starting locally and extending to the ends of the earth. Our prayer is that God would speak clearly to your heart, stir your faith to action, and invite you into a supernatural journey of generosity that produces eternal fruit.

item.title: Today’s Posture Tomorrow’s Possibilities | Justin Jahanshir
item.itunes:title: Today’s Posture Tomorrow’s Possibilities | Justin Jahanshir
item.description:
Is your response to God positioning you for victory?

In this message from Pastor Justin Jahanshir, we see how our posture of faith, obedience, and heart directly shapes the possibilities God releases into our future through the story of Elisha and King Joash in 2 Kings 13. Our prayer is that this message would challenge you to respond wholeheartedly to God’s instruction so you can walk in the fullness of His power and purpose.

item.title: Letting God’s Word Work In You | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Letting God’s Word Work In You | John Lindell
item.description:
How does God's Word change people?

In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we learn how receiving God’s Word with humility and responding to it with obedience leads to lasting transformation and blessing in our lives. Our prayer is that as you listen, you would allow God’s Word to take root in your heart, shape your actions, and produce spiritual fruit as you put it into practice each day.

item.title: Settle It: God Is Good! | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Settle It: God Is Good! | John Lindell
item.description:
Do you believe God is really good?
In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we are reminded from James 1:16–17 that God is unchanging in His nature and unfailing in His goodness, and that every good and perfect gift comes from Him. Our prayer is that you would guard the truth of God’s goodness in your heart, recognize His gifts in your life, and rest with confidence in His faithful and unchanging character.

item.title: Overcoming Temptation | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Overcoming Temptation | John Lindell
item.description:
How can I overcome temptation?

In this message Pastor John Lindell shares from James 1:13–18 how temptation follows a predictable pattern, why it never comes from God, and how God faithfully provides a way of escape through His truth and His Word. Our prayer is that you would be strengthened to recognize the lies of temptation, stand firm in God’s promises, and walk in freedom and victory through the power of Christ.

item.title: Joy In The Midst Of Trials | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Joy In The Midst Of Trials | John Lindell
item.description:
How can I have joy in the middle of trials?

In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we learn how God invites us to pray with joy, keep a Christ-centered perspective, and participate in spiritual growth even during difficult seasons. Our prayer is that as you trust God in the midst of trials, His joy and peace would guard your heart and mind and strengthen you to walk forward in faith.

item.title: When Life Is Hard – God Is Working | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: When Life Is Hard – God Is Working | John Lindell
item.description:
Why does God allow trials when life feels so hard?

In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we learn from James 1:1–12 how God is actively at work through trials—developing perseverance, maturity, and spiritual depth even when circumstances are difficult. Our prayer is that as you face challenges, you would respond with joy, faith, and wisdom, trusting that God is using every season to strengthen you and prepare you for the crown of life He has promised.

item.title: God Is Working While We Fast | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: God Is Working While We Fast | John Lindell
item.description:
What happens when we fast and pray?

In this message from Lead Pastor John Lindell, we explore Acts 10 and discover how God works in powerful, unexpected ways while His people fast—bringing revelation, direction, salvation, and the outpouring of the Holy Spirit. Our prayer is that as you seek the Lord through fasting and prayer, you would trust that God is working not only in the areas you are believing for, but also far beyond what you could ask or imagine.

item.title: Decide This Year Will Be Different | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Decide This Year Will Be Different | John Lindell
item.description:
What does it look like to truly meet with God and experience real change in your life?
In this message from Pastor John Lindell, we see how Jacob’s encounter with God shows us the power of personal surrender, persistent faith, and allowing God to transform us from the inside out. Our prayer is that as you step into a new year, you would choose to meet with God, hold onto Him in faith, and experience the life-changing blessing that comes through transformation.

item.title: An Open Heaven In 2026 | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: An Open Heaven In 2026 | John Lindell
item.description:
What does it mean to experience an open heaven over your life?
In this message, Pastor John Lindell reveals how God opens moments where heaven and earth intersect through His presence and voice. Our prayer is that as you seek the Lord, you would recognize His nearness and walk into an open heaven marked by His promises and blessing.

item.title: 3 Truths From The Christmas Story | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: 3 Truths From The Christmas Story | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
What can we learn from the Christmas story about how God works in our lives?
In this message, Pastor Brandon Lindell shares how we discover three powerful truths from the Christmas story that show how God works through ordinary people, speaks to them, and faithfully keeps His promises. Our prayer is that as you reflect on Mary and Joseph’s faith, you would be encouraged to trust God’s word, believe His promises, and recognize His presence at work in your own life today.

item.title: The God Of The Impossible | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The God Of The Impossible | John Lindell
item.description:
What does it mean to trust God for the impossible?

In this message from Lead Pastor John Lindell, we see how God works through impossibilities to accomplish His miraculous purposes, reminding us that nothing is beyond His power. Our prayer is that you would be encouraged to seek God’s presence, believe His Word, and trust that He is able to do what only He can do in your life.

item.title: The First Person to Read the Christmas Story | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The First Person to Read the Christmas Story | John Lindell
item.description:
What does the Bible say about the certainty of Jesus’ birth?
In this message, Lead Pastor John Lindell reminds us that the Christmas story is not a myth or tradition—it is a carefully investigated, historically grounded, Spirit-inspired account pointing us to Jesus. Our prayer is that as you hear how Luke anchors the birth of Christ in real people, real places, and real purpose, your confidence in who Jesus is and what He’s done for you will grow in a fresh and powerful way.

item.title: Come and See | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Come and See | David Lindell
item.description:
How do I help the people in my life experience Jesus?
In this message from Pastor David Lindell, we learn how Jesus calls us to look for the lost, share what we’ve found, and extend simple invitations that can change someone’s eternity. Our prayer is that as you reflect on this passage, you’ll be encouraged to see how God wants to use your voice, your story, and your invitation to lead people to Him.

item.title: When You Invest You Get Blessed | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: When You Invest You Get Blessed | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
What does the Bible say about generosity?
In this message, Pastor Brandon Lindell teaches how about intentional investment in the Kingdom of God and how He multiplies it for His glory and your good. Our prayer is that as you walk through this message, you’ll see how living open-handed positions you to experience God’s favor, joy, and supernatural provision in every season.

item.title: The Power Of A New Song | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Power Of A New Song | Brandon Lindell
item.description: How does God use new worship songs in our lives? In this message, Pastor Brandon Lindell shares how God uses new worship songs to help us remember His faithfulness, push back darkness, and carry His presence from James River Church to people all over the world. Our prayer is that your faith will be strengthened and you’ll recognize how God wants to use your worship as a weapon of victory in your own life and in the lives of others.
item.content:encoded:

In this message, Pastor Brandon Lindell shares how God uses new worship songs to help us remember His faithfulness, push back darkness, and carry His presence from James River Church to people all over the world. Our prayer is that your faith will be strengthened and you’ll recognize how God wants to use your worship as a weapon of victory in your own life and in the lives of others.

item.title: The Amazing Blessing Of Generous Giving | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Amazing Blessing Of Generous Giving | John Lindell
item.description:
What does the Bible teach about giving and God’s blessing?

Pastor John Lindell shows how Scripture reveals a blueprint for giving and a powerful promise of God’s blessing in return. Our prayer is that your faith will grow to trust God with every part of your life and experience the joy and overflow that comes from living generously.

item.title: God's Unique Way Of Answering Prayer | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: God's Unique Way Of Answering Prayer | John Lindell
item.description:
How does God answer our prayers in ways we don’t expect?
In this message from Lead Pastor John Lindell, we’re reminded that God’s thoughts and ways are higher than ours, and that many times His answers don’t look like what we imagined—even though they are exactly what we need. Our prayer is that as you listen, you’ll learn to lay down your expectations, recognize God’s supernatural provision, and embrace the opportunities He’s placing in front of you as His unique answers to your prayers.

item.title: How To Live More Blessed | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: How To Live More Blessed | David Lindell
item.description:
How can generosity lead to a more blessed life?
In this message, Pastor David Lindell teaches from Acts 20:35 and Isaiah 32:8 that generosity isn’t about what you have, but who you are. When you live open-handed—planning to give, standing firm in generosity, and putting God first—you experience a life that overflows with blessing, peace, and purpose. Our prayer is that you’ll see how true joy and lasting fulfillment come when you live to give, reflecting the heart of Jesus in everything you do.

item.title: Faith Decides First | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Faith Decides First | David Lindell
item.description:
How can my faith help me make good decisions?

In this message, Pastor David Lindell shares how faith leads by trusting God before the outcome is clear. From Hebrews 11:17–22, we learn that faith obeys, sees spiritually, lives for eternity, and rests in God’s faithfulness. Our prayer is that you’ll choose today to follow God fully and walk in His purpose.

item.title: Your Life Will Tell A Story | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Your Life Will Tell A Story | David Lindell
item.description:
What does it look like when God’s faithfulness becomes the theme of your life story?
In this message, Pastor David Lindell shares from 2 Samuel 22 and Psalm 18, we see how David’s testimony points to a God who protects, rewards, and equips His people for every season. Our prayer is that you’ll be reminded of how God has been your rock in the past, your strength in the present, and your victory for the future.

item.title: Expectation & Favor | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: Expectation & Favor | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
What happens when you begin to expect God to move in your life?
In this message, we’re reminded that expectation is the foundation for experiencing God’s favor and the miraculous. When you recognize your need, stir up your hunger, and remove barriers like doubt and fear, you open the door for God to do what only He can do. Our prayer is that this message builds your faith to believe for the supernatural and see God’s power at work in every area of your life.

item.title: How To Powerfully Impact The Next Generation | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: How To Powerfully Impact The Next Generation | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
How can we raise up a generation that knows and loves God?

In this message, we learn from the life of David how to see the next generation through God’s eyes, challenge them to follow Him wholeheartedly, and encourage them with the promises of His Word. Our prayer is that this message equips you to invest your faith into the lives of others and inspire them to passionately pursue God’s calling on their lives.

item.title: Satan’s Favorite Tactic | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Satan’s Favorite Tactic | David Lindell
item.description:
What is Satan’s favorite way to attack believers?
In this powerful message, we uncover how pride—the same sin that led to the devil’s downfall—is still his primary weapon against humanity. Our prayer is that this message helps you recognize the enemy’s schemes, walk in humility before God, and stand firm in the authority of Christ.

item.title: A Heart To Build God’s House | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: A Heart To Build God’s House | Brandon Lindell
item.description: What does it mean to build God’s house? In this powerful message, Pastor Brandon Lindell shares how God calls every believer to take initiative, give generously, and use their influence to build His Church. Through the life of King David, we see that when we build God’s house, God builds our lives. Our prayer is that this message stirs your faith to serve, give, and lead with a renewed passion for advancing God’s Kingdom.

item.title: Delivering People From Demonic Activity | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Delivering People From Demonic Activity | John Lindell
item.description: How does Jesus empower believers to deliver others from demonic influence? In this message, we learn how God has given every believer authority through Jesus to break the power of the enemy and bring freedom to those who are bound. Our prayer is that this message equips you to walk in spiritual authority, discern the enemy’s tactics, and confidently minister the delivering power of Jesus Christ.

item.title: His Manifest Wisdom Made Known Through The Church | Alex Seeley
item.itunes:title: His Manifest Wisdom Made Known Through The Church | Alex Seeley
item.description: How does God reveal His wisdom to the world today? In this message, special guest Pastor Alex Seeley shares a powerful and timely message on how God’s eternal plan is revealed through His Church — the living display of His grace and power. Our prayer is that this message deepens your understanding of God’s purpose for the Church and inspires you to live with boldness, freedom, and confidence in Christ.

item.title: Obsessed | Chad Veach
item.itunes:title: Obsessed | Chad Veach
item.description:
How can I live a life completely devoted to God?

In this message, guest speaker Pastor Chad Veach challenges us to live with an obsession for God that transforms our heart and priorities. Our prayer is that this message inspires you to learn God’s Word deeply, live it daily, and teach it boldly so others can experience the same joy and freedom found in Him.

item.title: The Foolishness of Not Trusting God | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Foolishness of Not Trusting God | John Lindell
item.description:
What happens when we stop trusting God?
Drawing from 2 Samuel 24 and 1 Chronicles 21, this message shows how King David’s decision to take a census exposed the danger of self-reliance, the ripple effects of sin, but ultimately, the mercy that follows genuine repentance and sacrificial worship. Our prayer is that you’ll trade counting for trusting, repent quickly, and bring God a costly, obedient worship that invites His mercy and fire into your life.

item.title: Created To Soar | Prayer Meeting
item.itunes:title: Created To Soar | Prayer Meeting
item.description: How do you win in life? This message unpacks the power of waiting on the Lord, showing how it produces strength, perspective, and endurance in our lives. Our prayer is that as you learn to hope in God, you will discover how He lifts you higher and renews you in ways beyond your own

item.title: Bold Moves & A Big God | Prayer Meeting
item.itunes:title: Bold Moves & A Big God | Prayer Meeting
item.description: How can I be bold in my Christian faith? This message from Ps David Lindell is from Acts chapter 4 and shows that supernatural boldness comes when we expect opposition, anticipate effectiveness, pursue God’s presence, and accelerate through prayer. Our prayer is that you will be filled with the Holy Spirit and step out in courage, knowing that where there is boldness, there will be breakthrough.

item.title: How To Handle A Time Of Crisis | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: How To Handle A Time Of Crisis | John Lindell
item.description: How can I respond biblically when facing a crisis? In this message from 2 Samuel 16–19, we learn from King David’s example how to walk through seasons of hardship with faith and wisdom. Our prayer is that you will be encouraged to pray first, refuse to react, and listen to wise counsel, trusting that God will carry you through every trial.

item.title: The Making of a Rebel | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Making of a Rebel | John Lindell
item.description:
What causes rebellion to grow in the heart?
This message looks at the life of Absalom and shows how rebellion develops through indulgent parenting, suppressed anger, isolation, obsession with image, undermining authority, and the desire for control. Our prayer is that you will learn to recognize these patterns and choose instead the freedom and peace that come from walking in God’s ways.

item.title: The Believer’s Authority | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Believer’s Authority | John Lindell
item.description: What does it mean to walk in spiritual authority? This message from lead Pastor John Lindell helps us discover how authority flows from submission to Jesus— with this spiritual authority we can bind and loose with the keys of the Kingdom to confront darkness, bring healing, and advance the gospel. Our prayer is that you’ll live fully submitted to Christ and boldly exercise His authority in everyday life.

item.title: Freedom From Secret Sin | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Freedom From Secret Sin | David Lindell
item.description:
How do we find freedom from the weight of secret sin?
This message from 2 Samuel 12:1–14 walks through King David’s story of sin and repentance to show how God uses confrontation, conviction, consequences, and confession to bring us back into right relationship with Him. Our prayer is that you will see the danger of hidden sin and the hope of forgiveness that comes when we openly confess and allow God’s grace to set us free.

item.title: The Blessing of Pursuing the Will of God | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Blessing of Pursuing the Will of God | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
How can I align my life with God’s will every day?
In this message, Pastor Brandon Lindell unpacks what it means to make God’s will our priority, even when it requires surrender, interruption, or enduring difficulty. Our prayer is that you will find strength and joy in trusting His perfect plan and living in the blessing of obedience.

item.title: David And Bathsheba | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: David And Bathsheba | John Lindell
item.description:
How can we guard our hearts?
This message from 2 Samuel 11 shows how David’s fall with Bathsheba began with small cracks in character that grew into devastating consequences. Our prayer is that you would take warning, flee temptation, and embrace the grace of God that empowers you to walk in holiness and protect what matters most.

item.title: God’s Dynamic Power | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: God’s Dynamic Power | John Lindell
item.description:
How can we experience the miraculous power of God in our lives?
This message from Pastor John Lindell teaches that the baptism in the Holy Spirit gives us power to witness, pray, and see miracles—and that power is released as we walk in the love of Christ. Our prayer is that you will be strengthened in faith, filled with His Spirit, and live in the miraculous as His Kingdom advances through you.

item.title: God’s Kindness Is Amazing | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: God’s Kindness Is Amazing | Brandon Lindell
item.description: How does God’s kindness lift us from shame?   This message reminds us that God’s kindness goes beyond what makes sense—He extends mercy to the undeserving, grace to the broken, and love to those who can do nothing in return. Our prayer is that as you reflect on David’s kindness to Mephibosheth, you will see even more clearly the amazing kindness of God shown to us through Jesus Christ.

item.title: God Always Has a Better Plan | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: God Always Has a Better Plan | John Lindell
item.description:
What is God's plan for my life?

In this message, Pastor John Lindell unpacks 2 Samuel 7 and the story of David’s desire to build a temple for God. We learn that sometimes God says “no” because He has a greater “yes” in store. Our prayer is that you would trust God’s perfect plan, respond with humility, and experience the joy that comes from living in His presence.
item.content:encoded:
What is God's plan for my life?

In this message, Pastor John Lindell unpacks 2 Samuel 7 and the story of David’s desire to build a temple for God. We learn that sometimes God says “no” because He has a greater “yes” in store. Our prayer is that you would trust God’s perfect plan, respond with humility, and experience the joy that comes from living in His presence.

item.title: The Importance of Reverence for God’s Presence | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Importance of Reverence for God’s Presence | John Lindell
item.description:
How do I show reverence for God’s presence?
In this message from Pastor John Lindell on 2 Samuel 6:1–23, we learn that holy awe—not casual familiarity—invites God’s blessing and joy, while irreverence breeds spiritual blindness and barrenness. Our prayer is that you’ll develop a worshipful heart that honors God’s ways above your own and experience His favor as you delight in His presence.

item.title: Experiencing Your Breakthrough | Heart of a King - #2 | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Experiencing Your Breakthrough | Heart of a King - #2 | John Lindell
item.description:
How can I experience a breakthrough?

 

In this message, Pastor John Lindell shows from 2 Samuel 5 and 1 Chronicles 14 how breakthrough comes when we recognize how God has been at work in our lives, understand that our breakthrough is meant to bless others, and resolve seek direction from Him. Our prayer is that you’ll be encouraged to pursue God’s presence and follow His leading so He can bring supernatural breakthroughs in your life.

item.title: Winning the Battle with Praise | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Winning the Battle with Praise | John Lindell
item.description:
How does praising God help me overcome spiritual battles?
In this powerful message, Pastor John Lindell shares how praise—especially in our darkest moments—can become a supernatural weapon that changes us, shifts our circumstances, impacts others, and defeats the enemy. Our prayer is that you’ll be encouraged to lift your voice in praise, even at midnight, and see God move in miraculous ways on your behalf.

item.title: How to Succeed in a New Season | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: How to Succeed in a New Season | David Lindell
item.description:
How do you follow God’s voice when stepping into something new?

In this message, Pastor David Lindell walks through 2 Samuel 2:1–11 to show how David’s transition into kingship offers a blueprint for succeeding in a new season. Our prayer is that you’ll be encouraged to seek God first, trust His leading, honor others, and persevere through spiritual battles as you step into all God has for you.

item.title: What Can Happen When You Fast | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: What Can Happen When You Fast | John Lindell
item.description:
What happens in the spiritual realm when we fast and pray?
In this powerful teaching from Acts 10, Pastor John Lindell highlights how fasting can release supernatural encounters, angelic visitations, divine direction, and spiritual breakthrough—not just for you, but for your family and beyond. Our prayer is that as you fast, God would work in ways that go beyond what you could ask or imagine.

item.title: The Benefits of Fasting & Prayer | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Benefits of Fasting & Prayer | John Lindell
item.description:
What are the spiritual benefits of fasting and prayer?
In this message, Lead Pastor John Lindell unpacks the powerful spiritual impact of fasting, revealing how it humbles us, opens doors of favor, sharpens our discernment, breaks strongholds, and draws us deeper into God's presence. Our prayer is that you would embrace fasting as a divine invitation to encounter God in a greater way and see breakthrough in every area of your life.

item.title: The Power of Worship | Oneka McClellan
item.itunes:title: The Power of Worship | Oneka McClellan
item.description: How can worship impact your destiny and draw you closer to God and His purpose for your life? This message reveals how the life of Miriam gives us a powerful picture of worship—its beauty, its influence, and even the consequences when pride tries to take center stage. Our prayer is that you will discover a fresh awe for God’s presence and experience deeper worship that leads to healing, humility, and breakthrough.

item.title: One More | Noah Herrin
item.itunes:title: One More | Noah Herrin
item.description:
How do I love others like Jesus?

Guest speaker, Pastor Noah Herrin, shows us how faith and a burden for the lost compel us to move beyond comfort and reach one more by drawing from the story of the paralytic lowered through the roof in Mark 2. Our prayer is that you’ll be stirred to carry a burden for your “one more” and step out in faith to share the hope of Jesus.

item.title: Fields Worth Fighting For | Sizzlin' Summer | Tim Timberlake
item.itunes:title: Fields Worth Fighting For | Sizzlin' Summer | Tim Timberlake
item.description:
How do I keep fighting when I feel like giving up?
In this message, guest Pastor Tim Timberlake shows how small stands of faith protect big promises, reveal our true authority, and turn fertile ground into destiny. Our prayer is that you’ll be strengthened to stand firm in every plot of ground God has entrusted to you.

item.title: It’s Already Won | Oneka McClellan
item.itunes:title: It’s Already Won | Oneka McClellan
item.description:
What should I do when the battle in front of me feels too big to handle?

In this powerful message from 2 Chronicles 20, Pastor Oneka McClellan reminds us that when we fix our eyes on God, even in fear and uncertainty, He shows up with power. Our prayer is that you’ll be encouraged to worship through the battle, knowing that God fights for you and the outcome is already in His hands.

item.title: Spiraling Up | Levi Lusko - Sizzlin' Summer
item.itunes:title: Spiraling Up | Levi Lusko - Sizzlin' Summer
item.description:
How can a personal encounter with God transform my pain into purpose?

In this message, Pastor Levi Lusko walks through Isaiah’s powerful vision of God’s glory, showing how seasons of loss and brokenness can become launching points for fresh revelation and divine calling. Our prayer is that as you experience God's presence, you would be drawn to deeper praise, receive healing through humility, and boldly say, “Here am I—send me.”

item.title: Reaching The Lost | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Reaching The Lost | David Lindell
item.description: How can I be part of God’s plan to reach people who don’t know Him? In this message, Pastor David Lindell shares how Jesus’ compassion for the crowds reveals the heart of God for the lost—and how He calls us to be part of the solution through prayer and action. Our prayer is that you’ll be stirred to pray for laborers, share the gospel boldly, and trust that God is working through your intercession to draw people to salvation.

item.title: Believing God For Big Things | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Believing God For Big Things | John Lindell
item.description:
How can I believe God for the impossible in my life?
In this faith-filled message from Lead Pastor John Lindell, we see how God moved powerfully on behalf of Joshua and the Israelites when they believed Him for big things, battled with confidence, and prayed boldly. Our prayer is that this message would stir your faith to trust God in new ways, knowing He is able to do more than you could ever ask or imagine.

item.title: Waiting For The Lord to Work | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Waiting For The Lord to Work | John Lindell
item.description:
What happens when we wait on God?
In this message, Lead Pastor John Lindell shares how seasons of waiting are never wasted with God. While we wait, He is delivering us, teaching us, and strengthening us. Through selected scriptures, we’re reminded that waiting on the Lord ties us closer to Him and prepares us for all He has ahead.

item.title: The Power of Self Talk | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Power of Self Talk | John Lindell
item.description:
What should you do when your troubles are your own fault?

In this honest and hope-filled message from Pastor John Lindell, we learn from David’s darkest decisions and discover how to respond when we've made a mess of things. Our prayer is that you’ll be encouraged to seek God, speak His truth over your life, and find restoration in His grace no matter how far you’ve strayed.

item.title: A Spiritually Dark Place | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: A Spiritually Dark Place | Brandon Lindell
item.description: What happens when you open the door to spiritual darkness? In this message, Pastor Brandon Lindell examines the tragic choices of King Saul in 1 Samuel 28 and reveals how ignoring God's voice and living in sin can lead to devastating consequences. Our prayer is that you'll be stirred to seek God and discover the grace and freedom that is found in Jesus Christ.

item.title: It’s Time to Train | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: It’s Time to Train | David Lindell
item.description:
How do you train yourself for godliness in a world full of distractions?

In this message from 1 Timothy 4:7–8, we’re reminded that spiritual growth doesn’t happen by accident—it requires personal responsibility, consistent discipline, and a deep desire to walk closely with the Lord. Our prayer is that this message stirs a greater hunger in your heart to pursue the presence of God and live a life growing in godliness.

item.title: Growing in Godliness | David Lindell
item.itunes:title: Growing in Godliness | David Lindell
item.description: Have you ever felt stuck in a cycle of spiritual déjà vu — repeating the same mistakes you promised you’d never make again? In this message, we see a powerful contrast in 1 Samuel 26: Saul in a cycle of sin and David choosing to grow in godliness. Our prayer for you is that you experience the freedom and victory that come from living a life fully surrendered to the Lord.

item.title: Ready or Not | Prayer Meeting | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: Ready or Not | Prayer Meeting | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
What can I do to be ready for all God has for me?
This powerful message from Pastor Brandon Lindell challenges us to live ready by offering our lives as living sacrifices to God and faithfully investing what He’s placed in our hands. Our prayer is that you’ll be stirred to action—honoring God with every opportunity, knowing your faithfulness today echoes into eternity.

item.title: Loving People Who Wrong You | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Loving People Who Wrong You | John Lindell
item.description:
How do I love someone who has wronged me?
In this powerful message from Pastor John Lindell, we look at how David chose mercy over revenge when given the opportunity to strike back at Saul—and how we are called to do the same. Our prayer is that you will experience the peace, joy, and victory that come when you lay down offense and trust God to be your vindicator.

item.title: The Importance of Personal Time with God | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Importance of Personal Time with God | John Lindell
item.description:
Why is time with God important?

Pastor John Lindell shares how Moses was transformed by spending time with God—face to face, day after day. Our prayer is that you would discover the power of personal time with the Lord and let His presence change your heart, your thoughts, and your life.

item.title: Seeking God’s Direction in Your Life | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Seeking God’s Direction in Your Life | John Lindell
item.description:
How can you know if you’re following God’s will for your life?
In this powerful message from Pastor John, we look at how David sought God’s direction in a time of crisis and how we can do the same today. Our prayer is that you’ll be encouraged to seek God intentionally and recognize His guidance in every area of your life.

item.title: Marks of a Wise Woman | The Heart of a Giant Killer - #9 | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Marks of a Wise Woman | The Heart of a Giant Killer - #9 | John Lindell
item.description:
What can we learn from the Bible about being a wise and godly?
In this message, Lead Pastor John Lindell shares a powerful message on the wisdom and character of Abigail in 1 Samuel 25, highlighting how her humility, courage, and discernment made her a voice of peace and prophetic insight in the midst of chaos. You’ll be inspired to see how God uses wise women to speak truth, take responsibility, and impact generations through their faith and obedience.
item.content:encoded:
What can we learn from the Bible about being a wise and godly?
In this message, Lead Pastor John Lindell shares a powerful message on the wisdom and character of Abigail in 1 Samuel 25, highlighting how her humility, courage, and discernment made her a voice of peace and prophetic insight in the midst of chaos. You’ll be inspired to see how God uses wise women to speak truth, take responsibility, and impact generations through their faith and obedience.

You’ll be encouraged to recognize God’s presence in the supernatural moments of life and discover your true identity in worship and obedience.

item.itunes:title: Basic Decisions for Big Blessings | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
What simple decisions can lead to God’s biggest blessings in your life?

In this message, Basic Decisions for Big Blessings, Pastor Brandon Lindell teaches from 1 Samuel 22 on how simple, obedient choices can lead to God’s extraordinary favor. By trusting God as your source, valuing what He provides, and listening for His voice, you position yourself for breakthrough—even in the cave seasons of life.

item.itunes:title: God Is Doing a New Thing | John Lindell

In this message, God Is Doing a New Thing, Lead Pastor John Lindell unpacks powerful scriptures that reveal God's desire to bring fresh vision, transformation, and breakthrough into your life. Learn how to recognize the new thing He’s doing, let go of the old, and make room for what He wants to pour into your future.

item.title: The Fear of Men | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: The Fear of Men | John Lindell
item.description: How can you break free from the fear of people and live with boldness and trust in God? In this message, The Fear of Men, Lead Pastor John Lindell shows how fear of people can trap us, distort our decisions, and weaken our walk with God. Through the story of David and the truths of Psalm 34, learn practical steps to overcome fear, live with boldness, and trust God’s strength over human opinion.

item.title: Power & Love | John Lindell
item.itunes:title: Power & Love | John Lindell
item.description:
How does God’s power and love work together to transform your inner life and future?

In this message, Power & Love, Lead Pastor John Lindell unpacks Ephesians 3:16–20 to show how the Spirit strengthens us, Christ dwells in us, and God’s love fills us beyond understanding. When you're rooted in love and empowered by His Spirit, you’re positioned for a life of fullness and supernatural possibility.

item.itunes:title: When God Shows Up in Your Life | John Lindell
item.description:
What happens when Jesus shows up in the middle of your everyday life?
In this special Easter Sunday message, Lead Pastor John Lindell shares how Jesus shows up in our everyday moments to walk with us, reveal His purpose, respond to our invitation, and transform our lives. Through the story of the road to Emmaus, we’re reminded that when Jesus draws near, everything changes.

item.itunes:title: Good Plans | Louie Giglio
item.description:
How can you trust God’s good plans even when life feels uncertain?
In this message, special guest Pastor Louie Giglio unpacks the truth of Jeremiah 29:11—reminding us that even in seasons of delay or difficulty, God is working good plans for our lives. When we seek Him with our whole heart, we discover hope, restoration, and a future filled with purpose.

In this message, Pastor David Lindell looks at the friendship between David and Jonathan, showing how the right friends walk with you in hardship, speak truth, and keep God at the center of the relationship. Who you walk with shapes where you’re going.

item.itunes:title: The Shekinah & God's Presence | John Lindell
item.description:
What is the Shekinah glory of God and how does His presence impact our lives today?
In this message, Lead Pastor John unpacks the power and beauty of God’s Shekinah glory—His manifest presence that filled the tabernacle, led His people, and brought revival at Azusa Street. Through fire, cloud, and miraculous moments, we’re reminded that God desires to dwell with His people and reveal His glory today.

In this message, lead Pastor John Lindell, shares insight on the origin of Revivals through history. item.itunes:summary:
What does walking by faith look like?
In this message, Pastor Brandon Lindell continues our Stand Strong series, showing us the bold faith in the life of Noah. Our prayer is this message would encourage you to be a person of faith as you learn from the actions of Noah!
item.itunes:author: James River Church

item.title: You Can Have Joy | Brandon Lindell
item.itunes:title: You Can Have Joy | Brandon Lindell
item.description:
What brings you joy?
In this encouraging message Ps Brandon Lindell shares the wonderful joy found in the presence of God. Our prayer is this would strengthen your faith as you draw closer in your walk with Jesus!
